content:
Now that we have your gas expense, let's add the car wash expense to get your total expense for January 2023.

You spent $28 on gas and $20 on the car wash and wax, so we can simply add those two amounts together:

Total expense for January 2023 = Gas expense + Car wash expense
Total expense for January 2023 = $28 + $20
Total expense for January 2023 = $48

So, your total expense for your Honda Civic in January 2023 is $48.
